title: Murf AI â€” AI Tool Review
description: Murf AI is a professional text-to-speech platform with 130+ studio-quality AI voices in 20 languages for voiceovers, e-learning, and podcasts. Murf AI is a professional text-to-speech platform offering 130+ ultra-realistic AI voices across 20 languages and accents. It's designed for creating professional voiceovers for videos, presentations, e-learning content, and podcasts. Features include voice customization, background music mixing, and a Chrome extension for quick conversions. Highlights: 130+ professional AI voices. 20 language support. Background music mixing. Team collaboration. Chrome extension.
